channel.title: Attention Adrelanos Tor Browser Update Fail on Workstation
channel.description:
So, my Whonix Workstation failed on Update Service to TB. Forensic it gives a Fail from torproject.org 4.5 Releases and so on, comes with Update 4.0.6. Probably the Update Function never works. An old stable release 4.5 dont work. I update manually to 4.0.6. Works perfectly for me. So what i must change scripting for a regular Updater?
Best Regards!
townsend

item.title: Attention Adrelanos Tor Browser Update Fail on Workstation
item.dc:creator: townsend
item.description:
Thank you very much for the fast Answer. Problem formyself solved. Thank you dear Adrelanos.

Best Regards!

townsend

Read full topic
